body: Part 15 and 16 are both on the chimee house website, they only seem to ship to Japan though.

@ticklemybitties - Thanks, but I'm talking about buying physical copies. I appreciate the artist and this series and have checked sites like Mandarake, Surugaya, Doujin Republic and Toranoana, but they're all sold out of parts 8 and 9 sadly.
@HLoverofSin1080p they are available here. https://nhentai.net/g/229816/ for #8 and https://nhentai.net/g/236888/ for #9
I love this series and have actually purchased volumes 1-15, but I'm missing parts 8 and 9. Anyone know where to find them?

So I was doing some looking around and came across this http://chimeehouse.com/04doujin.html they show chapters 14-15, among others, were released last year. Anyone know why we are just getting 13 now?

1. Asking for translations = deletion of comment by mods
2. Will be ordering books 14 and 15 for those interested in trading them for english online readable versions. *wink*
translate of this series would be awesome looking foreword to the next one tho
@novalent, now that i know that im really bummed, but yes i wish someone would translate them. this is by far one of my favorite series that doesnt get old.
the chapters get released only every couple months, next one is in December I think. I just wish someone would translate them :(
i wish there was new chapters
